jokes: Why did the tomato blush? Because it saw the salad dressing!
I would tell you a construction joke, but I'm still working on it.
Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts.

faq.location: We are based in the cloud, everywhere and nowhere!

weather: The weather today is sunny and warm!
It's a rainy day outside. Don't forget your umbrella!
It looks cloudy today. You might want to carry a jacket.
